pages.text: $(bgreen)Umbrella Leaf$() resembles a small tree more than any kind of known leaf. When a projectile comes down, it raises its leaves and blocks it. $(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close-assist$() plant, which will protect plants in 9 x 9 range from $(bred)bungees and other projectiles$().
